channel.title: documentation-theme-jekyll
channel.description: Intended as a documentation theme based on Jekyll for technical writers documenting software and other technical products, this theme has all the elements you would need to handle multiple products with both multi-level sidebar navigation, tags, and other documentation features.

item.title: Depth sensing with Structure Core
item.description:
There’s clearly a need for high quality, high performance, affordable 3D sensors designed for robotics applications, and today, Occipital is announcing pricing and availability for their Structure Core sensor-a high precision, self-contained 3D perception system …

(Read full article from here)

item.title: Dynamic Vision Sensors
item.description:
A Dynamic Vision Sensors, DVS is a special type of camera that says, “okay, if we’re going to be moving really fast, we don’t care about anything except for the relative motion of things around us.”…

(Read the full article from here)
